pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 14     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 2     $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive      $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Lush Caves    $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Bucket of tropical fish  $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)If an axolotl takes damage underwater, it may play dead, dropping to the ground for 200 game ticks (10 seconds) while gaining $(thing)Regeneration I$(). Hostile aquatic mobs ignore healing axolotls.
